job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description:
Senior Machine Learning/AI Engineer
Experience:- 7-10 Years
Location :- Bangalore
Salary :- 30-35 Lacs
Immediate Joiner or those who are serving Notice Period can apply.
Overview (With Technical Skills):
SAS Platform (Programming/ Developer)
▪ Have 7+ years of professional experience in machine learning or quantitative analysis or have a Ph.D. in Computer Science, Statistics, Mathematics, or Physics.
▪ Have excellent programming and algorithmic skills.
▪ Are proficient with Python and experience with data processing tools (e.g., SciPy, NumPy, Pandas, PyTorch, and Apache Spark).
▪ Have an in-depth understanding of supervised and unsupervised machine learning algorithms. Knowledge of engineering causal models and convolutional neural networks a big plus.
▪ Have proven track record of deploying learning algorithms in a production system.
▪ Have demonstrated end-to-end ownership of projects
▪ Have stellar listening and explanation skills
Key Responsibilities:
➢ Deliver state-of-the-art, causal algorithms to production for optimizing consumer product metrics
➢ Build and maintain the infrastructure for data and model management
➢ Work closely with the Turing design and engineering teams for machine learning-adjacent components, such as visualization, ad-hoc data analysis, and data processing
➢ Give talks, write blog posts, and produce peer-reviewed publications
➢ Define and lead the development of longer-term Turing Platform capabilities.
Compensation & Perks:
• Remote-friendly work environment
• Collaborative culture
• Mentorship from machine learning pioneers
• Competitive salary with generous equity. You get to join the company at the most advantageous stage
• Directly impact the growth of the company
• Play a significant role in strategizing the product roadmap
• Reimbursement of home-office setup
